title: News: Full lineup announced for the Warehouse Project 2013
content:
The line up for this year‚Äôs Warehouse Project was announced this morning and holy shit have those¬†Mancunian rave masters have done it again.

With nights featuring Chic, Disclosure, Four Tet, Thom Yorke and Pantha Du Prince to name a few, it looks like there‚Äôs no stopping this project.

In 2013 The Warehouse Project moved it‚Äôs event from the legendary Store Street venue to Victoria Warehouse which can be found to the west of Manchester‚Äôs city centre near the Old Trafford football stadium

Tickets for all events will be going on sale at 9am on Friday, 26th July at thewarehouseproject.com check out the trailer and full line-up below.

‚ÄúFor twelve weeks this city is ours..‚Äù
